Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

enumDescriptions.GloballyAccessible: Any external entity with the correct access details, which may include authorization information, can access the endpoints that this zone lists.
enumDescriptions.NonZonedAccessible: Any external entity that another zone does not explicitly list can access the endpoints that this zone lists.
enumDescriptions.ZoneOnly: Only accessible by endpoints that this zone explicitly lists.

enumLongDescriptions.GloballyAccessible: This value shall indicate that any external entity with the correct access details, which may include authorization information, can access the endpoints that this zone lists, regardless of zone.
enumLongDescriptions.NonZonedAccessible: This value shall indicate that any external entity that another zone does not explicitly list can access the endpoints that this zone lists.
enumLongDescriptions.ZoneOnly: This value shall indicate that endpoints in this zone are only accessible by endpoints that this zone explicitly lists.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to Resources that are not contained in or subordinate to this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Endpoints.description: The links to the endpoints that this zone contains.
Endpoints.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to the Resources of the Endpoint type that this zone contains.

InvolvedSwitches.description: The links to the collection of switches in this zone.
InvolvedSwitches.longDescription: This property shall contain the links to the Resource Collection of type Switch in this zone.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

ResourceBlocks.description: The links to the Resource Blocks with which this zone is associated.
ResourceBlocks.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to Resources of the ResourceBlock type with which this zone is associated.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Zone.description: The Zone schema describes a simple fabric zone for a Redfish implementation.
Zone.longDescription: This Resource shall represent a simple fabric zone for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

ExternalAccessibility.description: Indicates accessiblity of endpoints in this zone to endpoints outside of this zone.
ExternalAccessibility.longDescription: This property shall contain and indication of accessiblity of endpoints in this zone to endpoints outside of this zone.

Identifiers.longDescription: This property shall contain a Resource Collection of identifiers for this zone, which shall be unique in the context of other zones.

Links.description: The links to Resources related to but not subordinate to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described property shall contain links to Resources related to but not subordinate to this Resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain the status and health properties of the Resource and its children.

title: #Zone.v1_3_1.Zone
